skins.shipDescription: Illustrious-class aircraft carrier C Illustrious, Hull Number 87!
skins.selfIntroduction: Greetings, Commander. I am the armored aircraft carrier Illustrious. I may seem gentle, but I have quite the temper. I single-handedly bullied the Italian fleet during the raid at Taranto.
skins.acquisition: Greetings, Commander! Aircraft carrier Illustrious reporting in! I pray that you will bring love and peace to this world. May the light be with you.
skins.login: Greetings, Commander. I've tidied up a bit here. What do you think?
skins.details: Could you help me pick up that handkerchief...? I'd lose my balance if I try to pick it up myself...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Have you seen where did I put my planes? Oh? Right in front of me? Sorry, something blocked my line of sight.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander... can you feel my heartbeat through the palm of your hand?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, why are you always staring at me? Am I that pretty?
skins.secretaryTouch: It's as though... I've received your recognition, Commander. I feel so relieved.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Seriously, Commander, you're like a little kid.

skins.ENClientName: Morning Star of Love and Hope
skins.shipDescription: The end of sorrow, the beginning of happiness, and the desire for eternity.
skins.acquisition: The end of sorrow, the beginning of happiness, and the desire for eternity.
skins.login: Greetings, Commander. Did you have a good rest?
skins.details: I'll always be with you no matter where you go, Commander!
skins.secretaryIdle1: When will true peace come to these waters?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, my heart is beating so fast. Can you feel it?
skins.secretaryIdle3: You're always number one in my heart, Commander.
skins.secretaryTouch: Just whisper in my ear if you have anything to say~! *giggles*
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: I'm not opposed to intimacy, every now and then~!

skins.shipDescription: Sun kissed skin, scrumptious snacks and delicious black tea. It’s as if both my mind and body have been rejuvenated― Commander, care to join me for some leisurely chit-chat?
skins.acquisition: Sun kissed skin, scrumptious snacks and delicious black tea. It’s as if both my mind and body have been rejuvenated― Commander, care to join me for some leisurely chit-chat?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, how does it taste? Today’s scones are Edinburgh’s signature dish.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, black tea is supposed to be sipped~ At the very least, pay attention not to spill your drink.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Compared to the glaring sunset, I prefer this bright and gentle sunlight, what about you Commander?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, you can’t act this way… at the tea party.

skins.shipDescription: An invitation to the ball? Hehe, I would be honored to go... as long as you don't decline, Commander~
skins.acquisition: An invitation to the ball? Hehe, I would be honored to go... as long as you don't decline, Commander~
skins.login: Good day, Commander. Are you ready to attend the ball?
skins.details: I always feel my heart racing when I wear a different outfit in front of you, Commander~
skins.secretaryIdle1: As dance partners, we should hold hands like this... Commander, can you feel my warmth?
skins.secretaryIdle3: The orchestra has started playing~ Commander, would you like to dance with me?
skins.secretaryTouch: Did you want to talk, Commander? I'll always be here to listen to you~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, being proud about doing something inappropriate doesn't make it any less inappropriate.

skins.shipDescription: This is my first time wearing such exotic fashion, hehe~. Commander, if you like how I look, how about showing me off a little~?
It is my honour to get to wear another faction's garments. However... this traditional Dragon Empery dress feels rather tight around the chest area...
skins.acquisition: It is my honour to get to wear another faction's garments. However... this traditional Dragon Empery dress feels rather tight around the chest area...
skins.login: How do you do, Commander? May this splendid holiday wash away all your worries.
skins.details: This festival may be a foreign custom to many of us here, but I think it's delightful we get to enjoy it nonetheless. And it's all thanks to your efforts, Commander. Hehe.
skins.secretaryIdle1: All these Iris flowers are not just for showy decoration, they make for some aromatherapy as well. Hehe.
skins.secretaryIdle2: These Dragon Empery decorations all have a certain... unique charm to them, don't they?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, you absolutely must try the Empyreal cuisine the Royal Maids prepared. I've heard even Her Majesty praised the flavour. Hehehe.
skins.secretaryTouch: Is there something you would like to do with me?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Just this once, on this special day, I'll indulge your childishness~ Hehehe.
